name: tm32
effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user begins moving so quickly that it creates illusory copies to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.platinum: The user begins moving so quickly that it creates illusory copies to raise its evasiveness.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user begins moving so quickly that it creates illusory copies to raise its evasiveness.
